document_name_accent: roi loan noi tiet to sau sinh.json
document_title: Postpartum hormonal disorders: Causes and signs of recognition
subsection_content:
Signs of postpartum hormonal disorders include:
Tired.; Weight gain.; Difficulty concentrating.; Short-term memory loss.; Mood swings.; Migraine headache.; Insomnia.; Worry.; Hair loss.; Dry skin.; Constipation.; Irregular menstrual cycle; Postpartum depression.
Postpartum hormonal disorders make many new mothers feel depressed. Common symptoms include mood swings, poor sleep, loss of appetite, depression and anxiety, and the urge to cry, which tend to subside after a week or two. But if symptoms don't go away or get worse, this could be a sign of postpartum depression. (3)
Irregular menstruation is also a typical symptom when the mother has postpartum hormonal disorders.
